answers.answer: Get your sugar levels checked.  Try eating a protein and see how you feel. How long??  Sometimes mid cycle this will happen. Also just before period.
You may have chronic gastritis. You need to be checked out for H pylori infection.

You need to have an A1c blood test to see where your sugar numbers are. You could be hypoglycemic (low blood sugar), sadly, the more sugar you eat when you have this issue the worse it can get, it can also lead to diabetes. I definitely would have it checked.

question: when ever i dont eat for a while, usally after an hour, i start to feel very unwell. the only thing that makes it better is sugar. its very frustrating because it meant  have to eat sugary foods all the time and carry it were ever i go. i want to know why i feel sick to the point were i feel like im going to throw up and sugar helps..
title: why am i feeling sick when lacking sugar?
